documents.document: @caitrionambalfe @WChildCancer @LondonMarathon @ambalfe Watching now from Dublin, Caitriona! Good luck to ye both! Send some of the sunshine back this side, it's only 10C after the 21C we had yesterday!! xxx

@MarianKeyes So sorry to hear this, Marian. Our hearts are breaking for you all. As our parents age, we find it harder to imagine life without them, as you pointed out to me last summer when I was going through a tough time with my dad. Sending you love and hugs xxxxxx

@TonyBainz @vinnymacnamara @mytaxi_ie We've got 3 cataracts in our family. No, no one has 3 eyes. Just 2 for my dad, 1 for my mum. She's due for a cataract op on her right eye in July. They're usually advised not to bend down or shake their head too vigorously. And no water can enter the eye. Take care!
